title: Hour 1: Tua Good to be True?
description:
In this episode, Damien Woody, Emily Kaplan, and Chris Canty react to the Browns' controversial decision to start Deshaun Watson in their preseason opener and debate if the NFL should take any action against it. Serena Williams will say goodbye to tennis after the US Open and the crew discusses what they expect from her final outing. With NFL preseason well underway, Woody, Kaplan, and Canty predict what kind of season is in store for Tua Tagovailoa and debate who is the most important player (not named Dak) on the Cowboy's roster. After Ja'Marr Chase revealed his Top 5 wide receivers in the league, the crew argues which players top their lists. We go back in the archives to relive our favorite moments in sports history.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Will Tua be the Dolphins long-term starter?
